name: df-dmqss
body: |- wceq(cdmqss, copab(s0, s1, wceq(cqs(cdm(cv(s0)), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
comment: Define the class of domain quotients. Domain quotients are pairs of sets, typically a relation and a set, where the quotient (see ~ df-qs ) of the relation on its domain is equal to the set. See comments of ~ df-ers for the motivation for this definition. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 16-Apr-2019.)
